quizDescription.text:
Note:write down the option as answer. If there are multiple correct options write down them as comma space separated
Eg: c
Eg: a, d

questionText.text:
MCAfee is an example of
a. Virus
b. Anti virus
c. Malware
d. Photo editing software

VIRUS stands for
a. Very Intelligent Result Until Source
b. Very Interchanged Resource Under Search
c. Vital Information Resource Under Siege
d. Viral Important Record User Searched

To protect yourself from computer hacker, you should turn on a
a. Script
b. Firewall
c. Vpn
d. Antivirus
